class.name: jsx3.$Hash
class.text: Useful extensions to the JavaScript Object class for emulating a hashtable.

method.name: each
method.text: Iterates over all the key-value pairs of this hashtable. fct is called for each pair; the pair key is the first parameter and the pair value is the second parameter.

method.name: keys
method.text: Returns the list of keys of this hashtable.

method.name: values
method.text: Returns the list of values of this hashtable.
